title: 1970 U.S. Quarter Struck on 1941 Canadian Quarter
subtitle: An eBay listing for a quarter that was reportedly minted on the back of a 1941 Canadian coin appears to be real, but the money probably won't turn up in anybody's couch cushions.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A handful of 1970s quarters are worth a fortune, as they were minted on the back of a 1941 Canadian coin.
